posts.post_content:
Currently looking to buy inexpensive t209 bw, t210, t202...


email at [url]tlwise12@aol.com[/url]

Thanks 
Travis

Hey Travis,

I actually have a whole bunch of inexpensive t209s. Let me know if any of the following interest you -

t209-2 Ebinger (Wilmington) VG - mild corner wear, no wrinkling -- $110
t209-2 Beusewein (Charlotte) GD - one corner wrinkle, mild staining -- $90
t209-2 McKeavitt (Winston Salem) GD - one corner wrinkle, mild staining -- $90
t209-2 Stouch (Greenville) FR/GD - mild surface wear, no significant wrinkling -- $80
t209-2 Hearne (Wilson) PR/FR - wear on front -- $70
t209-2 Drumm (Greenville) PR/FR - WOF, rough lower corner -- $85
t209-2 Brent (Winston Salem) FR/GD - nicks on photo, no significant creasing -- $80
t209-2 Morgan (Goldsboro) FR - mild wrinkling/surface wear -- $80
t209-2 Boyle (Fayetteville) PR - wear/nicks on front -- $60
t209-2 Kelley (Wilmington) FR/GD - mild wrinkling -- $80
t209-2 Midkiff (Winston Salem) FR/GD - corner wear, edge chipping, no wrinkling -- $80
t209-2 Jackson (Spartansburg) FR/GD - heavy crease towards upper right corner -- $80 
t209-2 Keating SGC 10 - nice except for damage to lower right hand portion of card (includes caption) - $70
t209-2 Ferrell PSA 1.5 - nice card...couple nicks on right border - $80

is there anyway i can get scans of those? email at [url]tlwise12@aol.com[/url]

Thanks!
